Content:
# ZigTUI

Cross-platform TUI library for Zig, inspired by [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui).

![ZigTUI Dashboard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adxdits/zigtui/master/dashboard.gif)

## Features

- **Cross-platform** — Windows, Linux, macOS
- **Efficient rendering** — Cell-based diffing, only redraws what changed
- **Widgets** — Block, Paragraph, List, Gauge, Table
- **15 built-in themes** — Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...
- **Kitty Graphics Protocol** — Display images (with Unicode fallback)
- **No hidden allocations** — Explicit memory management

## Requirements

- Zig 0.15.0+
- Windows 10+ / Linux / macOS

## Installation
Translation:
# ZigTUI

Bibliothèque TUI multiplateforme pour Zig, inspirée de [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui).

![ZigTUI Dashboard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adxdits/zigtui/master/dashboard.gif)

## Fonctionnalités

- **Multiplateforme** — Windows, Linux, macOS
- **Rendu efficace** — Différenciation cellulaire, ne redessine que ce qui a changé
- **Widgets** — Bloc, Paragraphe, Liste, Jauge, Tableau
- **15 thèmes intégrés** — Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...
- **Protocole Kitty Graphics** — Affichage d’images (avec repli Unicode)
- **Pas d’allocations cachées** — Gestion explicite de la mémoire

## Exigences

- Zig 0.15.0+
- Windows 10+ / Linux / macOS

## Installation

RowTranslations.originContent: Cross-platform TUI library for Zig, inspired by [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Bibliothèque TUI multiplateforme pour Zig, inspirée de [Ratatui](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui).

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Efficient rendering** — Cell-based diffing, only redraws what changed
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Rendu efficace** — Différenciation cellulaire, ne redessine que ce qui a changé

RowTranslations.originContent: - **15 built-in themes** — Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **15 thèmes intégrés** — Nord, Dracula, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night...

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Kitty Graphics Protocol** — Display images (with Unicode fallback)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Protocole Kitty Graphics** — Affichage d’images (avec repli Unicode)
- **Pas d’allocations cachées** — Gestion explicite de la mémoire

Content:
**Available:** `default`, `nord`, `dracula`, `monokai`, `gruvbox_dark`, `gruvbox_light`, `solarized_dark`, `solarized_light`, `tokyo_night`, `catppuccin_mocha`, `catppuccin_latte`, `one_dark`, `cyberpunk`, `matrix`, `high_contrast`

Run `zig build run-themes` to preview all themes.

## Examples
Translation:
**Disponibles :** `default`, `nord`, `dracula`, `monokai`, `gruvbox_dark`, `gruvbox_light`, `solarized_dark`, `solarized_light`, `tokyo_night`, `catppuccin_mocha`, `catppuccin_latte`, `one_dark`, `cyberpunk`, `matrix`, `high_contrast`

Exécutez `zig build run-themes` pour prévisualiser tous les thèmes.

## Exemples

RowTranslations.originContent: Run `zig build run-themes` to preview all themes.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Exécutez `zig build run-themes` pour prévisualiser tous les thèmes.

Content:
```bash
zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo
zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo  
zig build run-themes      # Theme showcase
```
Translation:
```bash
zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo
zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo  
zig build run-themes      # Theme showcase
```

RowTranslations.originContent: zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo
RowTranslations.translatedContent: zig build run-dashboard   # System monitor demo

RowTranslations.originContent: zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo
RowTranslations.translatedContent: zig build run-kitty       # Image display demo

Content:
## Kitty Graphics

Display images in terminals that support the [Kitty Graphics Protocol](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Falls back to Unicode blocks automatically.
Translation:
## Graphiques Kitty

Afficher des images dans les terminaux qui prennent en charge le [Kitty Graphics Protocol](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Revenir automatiquement aux blocs Unicode.

RowTranslations.originContent: Display images in terminals that support the [Kitty Graphics Protocol](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Falls back to Unicode blocks automatically.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Afficher des images dans les terminaux qui prennent en charge le [Kitty Graphics Protocol](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/graphics-protocol/). Revenir automatiquement aux blocs Unicode.

RowTranslations.originContent: const image = tui.Image{ .data = bmp.data, .width = bmp.width, .height = bmp.height, .format = .rgba };
RowTranslations.translatedContent: const image = tui.Image{ .data = bmp.data, .width = bmp.width, .height = bmp.height, .format = .rgba };

Content:
**Supported:** Kitty, WezTerm, foot, Konsole (partial)  
**Fallback:** Windows Terminal, iTerm2, Terminal.app

## Platform Support

| Platform | Terminal | Notes |
|----------|----------|-------|
| Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | Native Console API |
| Linux | Any ANSI-compatible | POSIX termios |
| macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | POSIX termios |

## License

MIT

## Contributing

Issues and PRs welcome.
Translation:
**Supportés :** Kitty, WezTerm, foot, Konsole (partiel)  
**De secours :** Windows Terminal, iTerm2, Terminal.app

## Support des plateformes

| Plateforme | Terminal | Remarques |
|----------|----------|-------|
| Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | API Console native |
| Linux | Tout compatible ANSI | termios POSIX |
| macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | termios POSIX |

## Licence

MIT

## Contribution

Issues et PRs bienvenus.

RowTranslations.translatedContent: | Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | API Console native |

RowTranslations.originContent: | Windows 10+ | Windows Terminal, WezTerm | Native Console API |
RowTranslations.translatedContent: | Linux | Tout compatible ANSI | termios POSIX |
| macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | termios POSIX |

RowTranslations.originContent: | macOS | Kitty, WezTerm, Terminal.app | POSIX termios |
